title: IELTS Listening Part 3: Business Case Study
text: Listen to two students discussing their business assignment.

questions.prompt: Which company did the students decide to analyze?
questions.explanation: Maya rejects Tesla due to too much info. Alex suggests: 'Do you know **Bean's Coffee** on Main Street?' and Maya agrees.

questions.prompt: What was the main problem the company faced?
questions.explanation: Alex states: 'The issue was their **staff turnover**. They were losing employees every two months'.

questions.prompt: How will the students gather data?
questions.explanation: Alex suggests: 'I think it would be better to conduct **interviews** with former employees'.

questions.prompt: Which part of the assignment will Alex write?
questions.explanation: Alex says: 'I'd prefer to write the **recommendations** section at the end'.
Alex suggests: 'How about **Thursday afternoon**?' and Maya agrees.
